entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of the people who inserted the ends of the strings into their ears. He is also referred to as 'he' in the text.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the people who inserted the ends of the strings into their ears.

entities.name: salmon
entities.description: Salmon is mentioned as a type of fish that Harry tries to summon using the spell 'Accio'.

entities.name: goblins
entities.description: Goblins are mentioned as the speakers who are speaking in an unknown language.

relationships.description: Harry tries to summon salmon using the spell 'Accio'.
Harry can hear the goblins speaking in an unknown language.
